about_the_game:
Emptiness Sire is a turn-based puzzle game set in a medieval world reborn after a meteor shower devastates civilization. Explore the remnants of humanity, face terrifying creatures, and uncover hidden secrets as you guide three unique heroes:

- As the Knight, defeat enemies with your sword.

- As the Defender, protect yourself and others with a heavy hand shield.

- As the Explorer, stun enemies with your magical flute and climb walls to discover your way out.

The game will feature five distinct worlds, each containing one of four unique biomes. These biomes range from a medieval tundra to dense forests, desolate ruins, and cosmic horror landscapes, providing several challenges for players to overcome. The enemies you'll face have varied and distinct behaviors, making the gameplay increasingly challenging. Each new biome introduces tougher foes that will push your tactical thinking to the limit.

Developed by Oaks Games Studio, Emptiness Sire is still under development and is set for release in late 2025. The official demo, showcasing the first of five worlds, will debut at Tokyo Game Show 2024 from September 26th to September 29th.

Explore the ruins of humanity, face deadly cosmic horror creatures, and uncover secrets as you guide three heroes on a quest to survive the divine punishment.
